Detailed Description

Test advection diffusion and reaction in a single channel with uniform flow.

real(stm_real), intent(in)  test_decay,
logical, intent(in), optional  boundary_remote,
logical, intent(in), optional  detail_result 
)

Subroutine that tests error convergence of advection diffusion reaction.

Parameters:
[in]verboseSwitch for detailed show of the results
[in]test_flowFlag for testing advection process
[in]test_diffuseFlag for testing diffusion process
[in]test_decayFlag for testing decay process
[in]labelTest's name
[in]detail_resultSwitch for detailed print of the results
[in]boundary_remoteSwitch for active boundary value testing vs zero (remote BC)
